taxonomicnotes: McClelland (1939) described Perilampus aequipinnatus from Assam. Fang (2001) placed it under the genus Devario.
rationale: Devario aequipinnatus is a widely distributed species, common throughout out its range, with no major widespread threats. It is therefore assessed as Least Concern.
evaluator: Juffe Bignoli, D., Rema Devi, K.R., Dahanukar, N. & Chaudhry, S.
